title: ICICI Bank promoting strong compliance culture: Sandeep Bakhshi
description: ICICI Bank is promoting a strong compliance culture to balance risk and rewards, according to CEO Sandeep Bakhshi's annual address to shareholders. The bank is also enhancing its digital capabilities and operational resilience. Bakhshi emphasizes prudent growth, high governance standards, and leveraging digital technologies to support India's economic transformation.
